text: Meanwhile, he didn't exactly take the news that Kourtney had a boyfriend well. ` ` I get a little jealous,'' he admitted early on. And as recently as February he was ` ` still insanely jealous,'' a source told E! News â€” though, having started dating Richie last September, he doesn't have any more legs to stand on there. Kris Jenner, who has tirelessly embraced Scott as if he were one of her own kids, noticed right away that he was having issues with Kourtney's new relationship, especially after he put on a robe and got in bed during a trip to Williams Sonoma with her. ` ` The situation is extremely hard and complicated, but I do have my own priorities and things that I need to focus on.
